content:
Rewrite the following sentence into past perfect tense by adding appropriate auxiliary verbs and participles: 
After she had been working for several years, she had lost her job due to reasons unknown. 
(Table for reference: 
| Subject | Auxiliary Verb | Main Verb | Object |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| She | had | lost | her job |)
After she had been working for several years, she had lost her job due to reasons that were unknown.
